title: Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1 Display Values
description: Display values for Classification of Digital Health Interventions v1 ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions.

fhir:displays.description: Multilingual display values for ValueSet codes

^[a-zA-Z0-9._-]+$.description: Display values for a specific code by language

^[a-z]{2}(-[A-Z]{2})?$.description: Display value in the specified language (ISO 639-1 code)

1.1.1.en: Transmit health event alerts to specific population group(s)

1.1.2.en: Transmit targeted health information to client(s) based on health status or demographics

1.1.3.en: Transmit targeted alerts and reminders to client(s)

1.1.4.en: Transmit diagnostics result, or availability of result, to client(s)

1.2.1.en: Transmit untargeted health information to an undefined population

1.4.1.en: Access by client to own medical records

1.4.2.en: Self monitoring of health or diagnostic data by client 1.4.3 Active data capture/ documentation by client

1.4.3.en: Active data capture/ documentation by client

1.5.1.en: Reporting of health system feedback by clients

1.5.2.en: Reporting of public health events by clients

1.7.1.en: Transmit or manage out‐of‐pocket payments by client(s)

1.7.2.en: Transmit or manage vouchers to client(s) for health services

1.7.3.en: Transmit or manage incentives to client(s) for health services

2.1.2.en: Enrol client for health services/clinical care plan

2.2.1.en: Longitudinal tracking of clients' health status and services

2.2.4.en: Routine health indicator data collection and management

2.3.1.en: Provide prompts and alerts based according to protocol

2.3.3.en: Screen clients by risk or other health status

2.4.1.en: Consultations between remote client and health worker

2.4.2.en: Remote monitoring of client health or diagnostic data by provider

2.4.3.en: Transmission of medical data to health worker

2.4.4.en: Consultations for case management between health worker(s)

2.5.1.en: Communication from health worker(s) to supervisor
